title: Isolating the term with the exponent

title: The range of the exponential function
text: For the function $$y$$ $$=$$ $$e^{\left(-5x-2\right)}-4$$, what values of $$y$$ are possible?
speech: For the function  y   is equal to   e raised to the parentheses, negative 5 x, minus 2  power minus 4 , what values of  y  are possible?
pacedSpeech: e raised to the , negative 5 x, minus 2  power minus 4
